==Other versions==

In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']] appears the root KHIL-, signifying "follow". From this root derives:<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 364</ref>

*[[Quenya]]: ''hilya-'' ("to follow"; ''[[Hildor|hildi]]'' ("followers = mortal men"), ''-hildi'' (as suffix)
